panels.title: System Overview Metrics
panels.description: Global system overview across the entire system

panels.title: Circuit Performance Summary
panels.description: Aggregated performance metrics per circuit, including distance, curves, race times, speeds, and penalties

panels.title: Car Setup vs Race Time Over Time
panels.description: Time-based evolution of car setup values (P/A/M) and race time across simulations

panels.title: Simulation Results & Performance Breakdown
panels.description: Race ranking with driver, team, car setup, lap time, speeds, and penalties for the selected simulation

panels.title: Team Performance Overview
panels.description: General results for the team in simulations

panels.title: Team Simulation Results
panels.description: Data and results of specific simulation

panels.title: Profile by Circuit
panels.description: Comparison of straight and cornering speeds per circuit, highlighting speed differences and track characteristics

panels.title: Parts Impact
panels.description: Average part attributes and race results, showing how each component category impacts performance

panels.title: Team Car Setup & Race Time Trend
panels.description: Time-based trend of car setup values (P/A/M) and race time for the selected team and car

panels.title: Driver Skill Level
panels.description: Current skill level of the selected driver

panels.title: Driver Performance Summary
panels.description: Summary of race including wins, podiums, positions, and lap times

panels.title: Performance by Circuit
panels.description: Average race performance across different circuits
